sections.heading: Definitions, where found.For purposes of sections 77-2701
sections.text: 04 to 77-2713 and 77-27,239, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 77-2701.05 to 77-2701.56 shall be used.SourceLaws 1992, LB 871, ยง 4;Laws 1992, Fourth Spec. Sess., LB 1, ยง 23;Laws 1993, LB 345, ยง 15;Laws 1
